org.transitime.db.structs

Class Stop

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.db.structs.Stop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Entity
public class Stop
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    For storing in db information on a stop. Based on GTFS info from stops.txt file.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isScheduleAdherenceStop

        public boolean isScheduleAdherenceStop()
        Specifies if system should determine schedule adherence times for this stop. Some agencies configure all stops to have times but determining schedule adherence for every single stop would clutter things up. Only want to show adherence for a subset of stops.
        Returns:
        the adherenceStop

      • isLayoverStop

        public boolean isLayoverStop()
        Specifies if stop is a layover stop where driver is not supposed to continue until the scheduled departure time. First stop of trip always considered a layover stop if there is a departure time associated with it. Since the driver has a layover the vehicle is allowed to go off of the path.
        Returns:
        the layoverStop

      • isWaitStop

        public boolean isWaitStop()
        Specifies if mid-trip stop is a wait stop where driver is not supposed to continue until the scheduled departure time. First stop of trip always considered a layover stop if there is a departure time associated with it. Vehicle is expected to stay on the path.
        Returns:
        the waitStop

      • isHidden

        public boolean isHidden()
        Returns:
        the hidden
